title: Three aces and a joker: How the top heavyweights match up at the Vuelta a España
content:
Roglič, Evenepoel, and Vingegaard start as the pre-race favorites, with Spain's Ayuso trying to muscle in on the action: Here's the ultimate Vuelta 'form guide' for the three kings and a prince.

Read the full article at Three aces and a joker: How the top heavyweights match up at the Vuelta a España on Velo.
author: ahood
